channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.19 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.19

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Visibility fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Seaparator adjused for text only tabs
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResponsiveTable: IllustratedMessage description's line-height adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Wrap long text in large version of control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus Add CSS class for in-word StatusText wrapping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Added check to prevent duplicate id error if ITB is not yet destroyed
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.Table: PopinChanged event corrected
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Seaparator adjused for text only tabs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Visual adjustments
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolPage: Header will retain its rounded corners on child visibility change
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: theming/ThemeManager: Avoid multiple CSS loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat: parse dateTime timezone "z" for UTC
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: use theming variable for focus outline
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: set correct viewport for iPad with "request desktop website"
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: getScrollDelegate now returns proper delegate
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: mdc.FilterBar: make condition changes appliance more robust
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: enable drop over the browse button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: skip invalidation

item.title: Version 1.108.20 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.20

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Background of Actions strip set to "Transparent"
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: remove hover shadows
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Table: busy indicator should be visible until data received
    • Type: FIX, Description: - sap.m.NumericContent
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Value state box-shadow adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Delete active state for now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: enable insert/remove step for designMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: Align decrement icon
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fix navigation skipping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FeedListItem: fixed icon appearance
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#loadData: read all data (up to model size limit) in "Client" mode
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Background of Actions strip set to "Transparent"
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.Splitter: Added borders in Morning/Evening Horizon themes
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ColorPicker: adjust alpha handle position
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: stop drag and drop event propagation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: register events once

item.title: Version 1.108.22 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.22

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix RTA for content of DynamicPageTitle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Keyboard navigation after focusItem() now continues from the focused item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridList: Navigation matrix elements are included if they have DOM element
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Count in filter is now visible on mobile Safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: apply horizon theme updates
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: OPA tests in demo app are now running
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: f7 qunit is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarAppointment: getDomRef() now returns proper DOM element
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolPage: Parent busy indicator is now shown on ToolPage
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Component: skip the sync processing of i18n before resources are loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: Stabilize QUnit test for BeaconRequest
  • Library: sap.ui.dt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta - minimenu icons overlap - correction
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: ConditionType: leave empty unit as it is, only update only undefined
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarAppointment: getDomRef() now returns proper DOM element
  • Library: sap.ui.webc.fiori
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.webc.fiori: Third party zxing configuration corrected
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Downport of changes

item.title: Version 1.108.21 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.21

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: adjust to horizon theme updates
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Uses correct active text parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: validation errors from value help are not propagated outside
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fire intervalSelect event date from another month
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: DateNavigation now uses firstDayOfWeek
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Value is now formatted even if matching with previous value
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: removed max-width of the menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: apply horizon theme updates
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Prepare for upcoming 'unload' event deprecation and deprecate APIs 'onWindowBeforeUnload', 'onWindowUnload' and 'onWindowError' in 'sap/ui/core/Component'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#resetChanges: do not remove persistent messages
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: removed max-width of the menu
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Reset selectedSection corrected

item.title: Version 1.117.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.117.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: adjust expand/collapse button tooltip
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Visibility fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer,GridList: Keyboard navigation is now correct for RTL languages
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Navigation with page up and page down arrow keys now works
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: apply focus properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: fixed accessibility issues
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Horizon themes updated and style parameters applied
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: UploadSet: We now support icon and status text for file share documents in the UploadSet
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: Month view week selection
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ResponsiveGridLayout as default
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Panel: Panel sticky header implementation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: add isOpen() function
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SelectDialog: Added new "initialFocus" property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ListBase: Option to define the header level
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now allow setting a custom illustration when there is no data available in the Uploadset control
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Avatar: New 'enabled' property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now implemented UploadSet to use MenuButton for file selections
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: added clearIcon feature
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tile: Add alternative text to icon button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: return proper accessibiliy info
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: ajust accessibility info
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Enhance value binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Adjust control's state announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: set proper more link role
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: nest list items in a list
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitContainer: Avoid deprecated "tap" events
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Arrows in the Page Indicator area are hidden when not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Remove tooltip from "All" Segmented button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StandardTile: Fix aria-describedby attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: adjust value help icon settings
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: adjust has popup announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Table: busy indicator should be visible until data received
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nDialog: Primary action is now emphasized in warning dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Error in mobile fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: prevent warning log when endButton is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: ListBase: Improve documentation of property multiSelectMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FacetFilter: remove duplicate tooltips.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimeField: Now works correct with TimeOfDay
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: improve the accessibility info
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: Failing QUnit test with timezone Honolulu & Chicago
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: remove redundant navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: fix broken fiori 3 themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ExpandableText: More/Less texts are now changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: correction for icon 'slim-arrow-up' for theme 'horizon'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: strings from data are no longer resolved as binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed hard error on invalid property entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Replace deprecated method
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Initial line-height fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m Popover: Content width adjustment fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantManagement: add text-shadow to title
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: remove inaccurate aria attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilePreviewDialog: Load RichTextEditor dependency dynamically, handle case when not available
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: enable the tooltip setter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: switch off native autocomplete
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nFilterPanel: ignores formatter for the P13nItem type property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Visual test enhancement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link. prevent default behavior on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m Popover: Content width is now fixed
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: core/IconPool: Register theme dependent icons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: SearchField focus is now on the search button when there is value on Horizon themes
  • Library: sap.ui.commons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ResponsiveGridLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: core/IconPool: Register theme dependent icons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SemanticFormElement: support rendering of Links
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: use theming variable for focus outline
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: set correct viewport for iPad with "request desktop website"
    • Type: FIX, Description: Core: fix wrong documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: XMLTemplateProcessor: Support for core:require statements in XHTML
    • Type: FIX, Description: OPA: Exclude static area controls from Component parent check
    • Type: FIX, Description: ManagedObjectModel: checkUpdate - wrong filter used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.date.UI5Date#setYear: behave like Date#setYear
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/Localization: setLanguage shouldn't change '_' to '-'
    • Type: FIX, Description: Theming: Make setThemeRoot more robust
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/message/MessageMixin: no warning when label text isn't changed
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl - Add adaptation id to setDefault method
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SemanticFormElement: support rendering of Links
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ResponsiveGridLayout as default
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: getScrollDelegate now returns proper delegate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.BlockLayoutCell: Remove ARIA violation caused by aria-labelledby
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Field: provide API to check for user interaction
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: mdc.FilterBarBase: changing required field error text
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: keep ValueState if value updated async
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: do not update unit value in error case
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC: Rearranged FieldBase QUnit tests to avoid issues with focus testing
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC: FieldBase should only modify showValueStateMessage when ValueHelp is actually open
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: handle "" and null as "not set" for additionalValue
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field with unit: unit part not announced if inside table
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta - Save as adaptation UI for rtl
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: add isOpen() function
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.Currency: add sample without decimals
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.MenuItem: Improve accessibility attributes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: Improve announcement order
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: make disabled text field items focusable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.MonthsRowRenderer: Remove duplicate ACC info
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Runtime error prevented
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.AnalyticalColumnMenu#undefined] A column menu which is used by the analytical column
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.AnalyticalTable#getColumnVisibilityMenuSorter] Gets current value of property {@link #getColumnVisibilityMenuSorter columnVisibilityMenuSorter}. Functions which is used to sort the column visibility menu entries e.g.: function(ColumnA, ColumnB) { return 0 = equals, <0 lower, >0 greater }; Other values than functions will be ignored.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.AnalyticalTable#setColumnVisibilityMenuSorter] Sets a new value for property {@link #getColumnVisibilityMenuSorter columnVisibilityMenuSorter}. Functions which is used to sort the column visibility menu entries e.g.: function(ColumnA, ColumnB) { return 0 = equals, <0 lower, >0 greater }; Other values than functions will be ignored. When called with a value of <code>null</code> or <code>undefined</code>, the default value of the property will be restored.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#attachColumnMenuOpen] Attaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> to the {@link #event:columnMenuOpen columnMenuOpen} event of this <code>sap.ui.table.Column</code>. When called, the context of the event handler (its <code>this</code>) will be bound to <code>oListener</code> if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this <code>sap.ui.table.Column</code> itself. Fires before the column menu is opened.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#destroyMenu] use the <code>headerMenu</code> association instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#detachColumnMenuOpen] Detaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> from the {@link #event:columnMenuOpen columnMenuOpen} event of this <code>sap.ui.table.Column</code>. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#fireColumnMenuOpen] Fires event {@link #event:columnMenuOpen columnMenuOpen} to attached listeners. Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the <code>preventDefault</code> method on the event object. The return value of this method indicates whether the default action should be executed.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#getMenu] use the <code>headerMenu</code> association instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#setMenu] use the <code>headerMenu</code> association instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#columnMenuOpen] Fires before the column menu is opened. Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the <code>preventDefault</code> method on the event object.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.ColumnMenu#undefined] use the {@link sap.m.table.columnmenu.Menu} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#attachColumnSelect] Attaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> to the {@link #event:columnSelect columnSelect} event of this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code>. When called, the context of the event handler (its <code>this</code>) will be bound to <code>oListener</code> if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code> itself. fired when a column of the table has been selected
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#attachColumnVisibility] Attaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> to the {@link #event:columnVisibility columnVisibility} event of this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code>. When called, the context of the event handler (its <code>this</code>) will be bound to <code>oListener</code> if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code> itself. fired when the visibility of a table column is changed.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#detachColumnSelect] Detaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> from the {@link #event:columnSelect columnSelect} event of this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code>. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#detachColumnVisibility] Detaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> from the {@link #event:columnVisibility columnVisibility} event of this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code>. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#fireColumnSelect] Fires event {@link #event:columnSelect columnSelect} to attached listeners. Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the <code>preventDefault</code> method on the event object. The return value of this method indicates whether the default action should be executed.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#fireColumnVisibility] Fires event {@link #event:columnVisibility columnVisibility} to attached listeners. Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the <code>preventDefault</code> method on the event object. The return value of this method indicates whether the default action should be executed.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#getShowColumnVisibilityMenu] use a <code>ColumnMenu</code> with a custom menu item in the <code>headerMenu</code> association instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#setShowColumnVisibilityMenu] use a <code>ColumnMenu</code> with a custom menu item in the <code>headerMenu</code> association instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#columnSelect] fired when a column of the table has been selected Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the <code>preventDefault</code> method on the event object.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#columnVisibility] fired when the visibility of a table column is changed. Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the <code>preventDefault</code> method on the event object.

item.title: Version 1.117.3 Changes

item.title: Version 1.118.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.118.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Placeholders of List and Table cards no longer reserve space for group headers

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Remove horizontal scrollbar

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: first day of the week properly displayed

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: translation no longer escapes special symbol
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Correct designtime overlays
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: using a stable date in a test scenario

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuItem: addEventDelegate is handled correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: getVisibleIntervalsCount now returns the correct value ignoring daylight saving
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: Add icon accessibility information
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Panel: round corners when sticky header is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: aria-labelledby of the content is now always set to the root tab after tab selection
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Set container as not-focusable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarLegend: provide counting information
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: show correct time with bound timezone
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Added check to prevent duplicate id error if ITB is not yet destroyed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: display non working days
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ToggleButton: remove duplicate JAWS announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: aria-labelledby of the content is now always set to the root tab
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: adjsut focus outline
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePickerSlider: Remove disallowed aria property
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: correction for author column
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Prevent default behaviour when dragging tabs via keyboard

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Seaparator adjused for text only tabs

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolPage: Header will retain its rounded corners on child visibility change

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: generic Web Components support for UI5
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Theming: Support for default theme and fallback themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.DateInterval#parseValue: no milliseconds at interval end
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#_getSkipAndTop: fix calculation of "iLimit"
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fix Core Qunit tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.type.TimeOfDay#getModelValueFromISOString: Fix issue for set precisions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.type.DateTimeOffset#getModelValueFromISOString: Fix issue for V4 with set precisions
    • Type: FIX, Description: asynchronousXMLView.qunit.js: Stabelize execution order
    • Type: FIX, Description: jquery.sap.measure.qunit: Stabilize tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: theming/ThemeManager: Avoid multiple CSS loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat: parse dateTime timezone "z" for UTC
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/routing/Router: update the current route when 'navTo' is called
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: use theming variable for focus outline
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: set correct viewport for iPad with "request desktop website"
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Entity title break-word
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Placeholders of List and Table cards no longer reserve space for group headers
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: AlignedFlowLayout / FilterBar: Adjust item layouts according to filterbar specs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveSplitter: Accessibility roles are now updated
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Field: support data types on additionalValue

    • Type: FIX, Description: mdc.FilterBarBase: enhance filter field error determination

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Remove horizontal scrollbar

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: getVisibleIntervalsCount now returns the correct value ignoring daylight saving
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarTimeInterval: add accessibility information
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: Nest list items in list
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.MenuTextFieldItem: Add aria role to input
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: skip invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.webc.common
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: generic Web Components support for UI5
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.webc.common: fix typo in MetadataOptions JSDoc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.webc.common: fix JSDoc for proper type definitions
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: introduce beforeNavigation event
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#getGrouped] Gets current value of property {@link #getGrouped grouped}. Indicates if the column is grouped. Default value is <code>false</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Column#setGrouped] Sets a new value for property {@link #getGrouped grouped}. Indicates if the column is grouped. When called with a value of <code>null</code> or <code>undefined</code>, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is <code>false</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#attachGroup] Attaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> to the {@link #event:group group} event of this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code>. When called, the context of the event handler (its <code>this</code>) will be bound to <code>oListener</code> if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code> itself. fired when the table is grouped (experimental!).
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#detachGroup] Detaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> from the {@link #event:group group} event of this <code>sap.ui.table.Table</code>. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#fireGroup] Fires event {@link #event:group group} to attached listeners. Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the <code>preventDefault</code> method on the event object. The return value of this method indicates whether the default action should be executed.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#group] fired when the table is grouped (experimental!). Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the <code>preventDefault</code> method on the event object.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.webc.common.WebComponent#undefined] Use sap.ui.core.webc.WebComponent instead!
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.webc.common.WebComponentMetadata#undefined] Use sap.ui.core.webc.WebComponentMetadata instead!
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content.MTable#attachContentUpdated] This event is not fired or consumed anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content.MTable#detachContentUpdated] This event is not fired or consumed anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content.MTable#fireContentUpdated] This event is not fired or consumed anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content.MTable#contentUpdated] This event is not fired or consumed anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui#getCore] Please require 'sap/ui/core/Core' instead and use the module export directly without using 'new'."
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getActiveTerminologies] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getActiveTerminologies} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#addPrerenderingTask] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Rendering.addPrerenderingTask Rendering.addPrerenderingTask} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#applyChanges] Enforces an immediate update of the visible UI (aka "rendering"). In general, applications and Controls should avoid calling this method and instead let the framework manage any necessary rendering.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachFormatError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#attachFormatError ManagedObject#attachFormatError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachInit] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Core.ready Core.ready} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachLocalizationChanged] Please use {@link sap.base.i18n.Localization#attachChange Localization#attachChange} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachParseError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#attachParseError ManagedObject#attachParseError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachThemeChanged] See {@link sap.ui.core.Theming#attachApplied Theming#attachApplied} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachValidationError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#attachValidationError ManagedObject#attachValidationError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachValidationSuccess] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#attachValidationSuccess ManagedObject#attachValidationSuccess} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#byFieldGroupId] use {@link sap.ui.core.Control#getControlsByFieldGroup Control.prototype.getControlsByFieldGroup} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachFormatError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#detachFormatError ManagedObject#detachFormatError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachLocalizationChanged] Please use {@link sap.base.i18n.Localization#detachChange Localization#detachChange} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachParseError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#detachParseError ManagedObject#detachParseError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachThemeChanged] See {@link sap.ui.core.Theming#detachApplied Theming#detachApplied} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachValidationError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#detachValidationError ManagedObject#detachValidationError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachValidationSuccess] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#detachValidationSuccess ManagedObject#detachValidationSuccess} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#fireFormatError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#fireFormatError ManagedObject#fireFormatError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#fireParseError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#fireParseError ManagedObject#fireParseError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#fireValidationError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#fireValidationError ManagedObject.fireValidationError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#fireValidationSuccess] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#fireValidationSuccess ManagedObject#fireValidationSuccess} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getMessageManager] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Messaging Messaging} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getModel] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#getModel ManagedObject#getModel} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getUIDirty] Returns <code>true</code> if there are any pending rendering tasks or when such rendering tasks are currently being executed.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#hasModel] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#hasModel ManagedObject#hasModel} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#isInitialized] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Core.ready Core.ready} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#isLocked] Returns the locked state of the <code>sap.ui.core.Core</code>
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#isMobile] use {@link sap.ui.Device.browser.mobile Device.browser.mobile} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#lock] Locks the Core. No browser events are dispatched to the controls. Lock should be called before and after the DOM is modified for rendering, roundtrips... Exceptions might be the case for asynchronous UI behavior
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#setModel] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#setModel ManagedObject#setModel} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#unlock] Unlocks the Core. Browser events are dispatched to the controls again after this method is called.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#formatError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#event:formatError formatError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#localizationChanged] See {@link sap.base.i18n.Localization#change Localization#change} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#parseError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#event:parseError parseError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#ThemeChanged] See {@link sap.ui.core.Theming#applied Theming#applied} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#validationError] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#event:validationError validationError} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#validationSuccess] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#event:validationSuccess validationSuccess} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.message.MessageManager#undefined] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Messaging Messaging} instead.

item.title: Version 1.119.0 Changes

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#getVisibleRowCountMode] use the <code>rowMode</code> aggregation instead.

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#setFixedRowCount] use the <code>rowMode</code> aggregation instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#setMinAutoRowCount] use the <code>rowMode</code> aggregation instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#setRowHeight] use the <code>rowMode</code> aggregation instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#setVisibleRowCount] use the <code>rowMode</code> aggregation instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#setVisibleRowCountMode] use the <code>rowMode</code> aggregation instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [module:sap/base/util/UriParameters#undefined] See class description for details.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [module:sap/ui/core/getCompatibilityVersion#undefined] Returns the used compatibility version for the given feature.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Component#onWindowBeforeUnload] recommended to use the browser-native page lifecycle API, providing events such as 'pageshow' and 'pagehide'
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Component#onWindowError] recommended to use the browser-native API to listen for errors: window.addEventListener("error", function() { ... })
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Component#onWindowUnload] Newer browser versions deprecate the browser-native 'unload' event. Therefore, the former API won't reliably work anymore. Please have a look at the browser-native page lifecycle API, e.g. its events 'pageshow' and 'pagehide'.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getCompatibilityVersion] Returns the used compatibility version for the given feature.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getLanguage] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getLanguage} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getLanguageTag] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getLanguageTag} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getLocale] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getLanguageTag} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getRTL] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getRTL} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getSAPLogonLanguage] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getSAPLogonLanguage} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getTheme] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.getTheme} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getTimezone] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.getTimezone} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getUIDPrefix] Please use {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObjectMetadata.getUIDPrefix ManagedObjectMetadata.getUIDPrefix} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setLanguage] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.setLanguage} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setRTL] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.setRTL} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setTheme] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.setTheme} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#setTimezone] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Localization.setTimezone} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#applyTheme] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.setTheme Theming.setTheme} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachControlEvent] Registers a listener for control events. When called, the context of the listener (its <code>this</code>) will be bound to <code>oListener</code> if specified, otherwise it will be bound to a dummy event provider object.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#attachLibraryChanged] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.attachLibraryChanged Lib.attachLibraryChanged} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#byId] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Element.getElementById Element.getElementById} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#createRenderManager] Returns a new instance of the RenderManager for exclusive use by the caller. The caller must take care to destroy the render manager when it is no longer needed. Calling this method before the Core has been {@link #isInitialized initialized}, is not recommended.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachControlEvent] Unregisters a listener for control events. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#detachLibraryChanged] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.detachLibraryChanged Lib.detachLibraryChanged} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#extend] Creates a new subclass of class <code>sap.ui.core.Core</code> with name <code>sClassName</code> and enriches it with the information contained in <code>oClassInfo</code>. <code>oClassInfo</code> might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject.extend}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getCurrentFocusedControlId] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Element.getActiveElement Element.getActiveElement} to get the currently focused element. You can then retrieve the ID of that element with {@link sap.ui.core.Element#getId Element#getId}. Please be aware, {@link sap.ui.core.Element.getActiveElement Element.getActiveElement} can return 'undefined'.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getEventBus] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.EventBus.getInstance EventBus.getInstance} for global usage instead. Creating an own local instance is the preferred usage.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getLibraryResourceBundle] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.getResourceBundleFor Lib.getResourceBundleFor} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getLoadedLibraries] Returns a map of library info objects for all currently loaded libraries, keyed by their names. The structure of the library info objects matches the structure of the info object that the {@link #initLibrary} method expects. Only property names documented with <code>initLibrary</code> should be accessed, any additional properties might change or disappear in future. When a property does not exists, its default value (as documented with <code>initLibrary</code>) should be assumed. <b>Note:</b> The returned info objects must not be modified. They might be a living copy of the internal data (for efficiency reasons) and the framework is not prepared to handle modifications to these objects.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getMetadata] Returns the metadata for class <code>sap.ui.core.Core</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#getStaticAreaRef] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/StaticArea.getDomRef StaticArea.getDomRef} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#includeLibraryTheme] Includes a library theme into the current page (if a variant is specified it will include the variant library theme)
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#initLibrary] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.init Lib.init} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#isStaticAreaRef] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/StaticArea.contains StaticArea.contains} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#isThemeApplied] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.attachApplied Theming.attachApplied} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#loadLibraries] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.load Lib.load} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#loadLibrary] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.load Lib.load} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#notifyContentDensityChanged] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/Theming.notifyContentDensityChanged Theming.notifyContentDensityChanged} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#setThemeRoot] Defines the root directory from below which UI5 should load the theme with the given name. Optionally allows restricting the setting to parts of a theme covering specific control libraries. Example: <pre> sap.ui.getCore().setThemeRoot("my_theme", "https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes"); sap.ui.getCore().applyTheme("my_theme"); </pre> will cause the following file to be loaded (assuming that the bootstrap is configured to load libraries <code>sap.m</code> and <code>sap.ui.layout</code>): <pre> https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes/sap/ui/core/themes/my_theme/library.css https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes/sap/ui/layout/themes/my_theme/library.css https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes/sap/m/themes/my_theme/library.css </pre> If parts of the theme are at different locations (e.g. because you provide a standard theme like "sap_belize" for a custom control library and this self-made part of the standard theme is at a different location than the UI5 resources), you can also specify for which control libraries the setting should be used, by giving an array with the names of the respective control libraries as second parameter: <pre> sap.ui.getCore().setThemeRoot("sap_belize", ["my.own.library"], "https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes"); </pre> This will cause the Belize theme to be loaded from the UI5 location for all standard libraries. Resources for styling the <code>my.own.library</code> controls will be loaded from the configured location: <pre> https://sdk.openui5.org/resources/sap/ui/core/themes/sap_belize/library.css https://sdk.openui5.org/resources/sap/ui/layout/themes/sap_belize/library.css https://sdk.openui5.org/resources/sap/m/themes/sap_belize/library.css https://mythemeserver.com/allThemes/my/own/library/themes/sap_belize/library.css </pre> If the custom theme should be loaded initially (via bootstrap attribute), the <code>themeRoots</code> property of the <code>window["sap-ui-config"]</code> object must be used instead of calling <code>sap.ui.getCore().setThemeRoot(...)</code> in order to configure the theme location early enough.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Core#libraryChanged] Please use {@link sap.ui.core.Lib.attachLibraryChanged Lib.attachLibraryChanged} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#getSecurityToken] use {@link #securityTokenAvailable} instead
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.Input#getValueHelpOnly] The property valueHelpOnly should not be used anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.Input#isValueHelpOnlyOpener] the property valueHelpOnly should not be used anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.Input#setValueHelpOnly] The property valueHelpOnly should not be used anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.MultiInput#isValueHelpOnlyOpener] the property valueHelpOnly should not be used anymore
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#attachRowHeaderClick] Attaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> to the {@link #event:rowHeaderClick rowHeaderClick} event of this <code>sap.m.PlanningCalendar</code>. When called, the context of the event handler (its <code>this</code>) will be bound to <code>oListener</code> if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this <code>sap.m.PlanningCalendar</code> itself. Fires when a row header is clicked.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#detachRowHeaderClick] Detaches event handler <code>fnFunction</code> from the {@link #event:rowHeaderClick rowHeaderClick} event of this <code>sap.m.PlanningCalendar</code>. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#fireRowHeaderClick] Fires event {@link #event:rowHeaderClick rowHeaderClick} to attached listeners.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#getAppointmentsReducedHeight] Please use the <code>appointmentHeight</code> with value "Automatic" property instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#setAppointmentsReducedHeight] Please use the <code>appointmentHeight</code> with value "Automatic" property instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.PlanningCalendar#rowHeaderClick] Fires when a row header is clicked.

item.title: Version 1.120.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Allow resize columns by dragging
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: List Card Placeholders rendering is now improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridList: Navigation matrix elements are included if they have DOM element
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Keyboard navigation after focusItem() now continues from the focused item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayoutSemanticHelper: Action buttons info corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Attribute icon in List card is now always on the same line with text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Fixed cut off corners in sap.f.Card sample
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.7 and v4.19
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Improve removal of selection
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate static Object.isA and provide alternative
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced the linkTileContents aggregation that can render an icon and a link on the generic tile
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CLDR upgrade to version 43.0.0
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of sap/ui/core/DeclarativeSupport
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: introduce new set of indication colors
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: DataType, Library: Enable enum type registration without globals
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: OPA tests in demo app are now running
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.CustomMonthPicker: fixed missing year in internal MonthPicker
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Reopen Suggestion Popover when new data is bound
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Type-ahead functionality corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Condition for validating text calculated properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: f7 qunit is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Reopen Suggestion Popover when new data is bound
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarAppointment: getDomRef() now returns proper DOM element
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: adjust keyboard interaction
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: List Card Placeholders rendering is now improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: improve documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RangeSlider: apply active state to tickmarks correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.BusyIndicator: Position of the Busy Indicator in Bar is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Circle is correctly aligned on RTL mode and Compact form factor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: week-related options now return proper values
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: adjust to horizon theme updates
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: validation errors from value help are not propagated outside
    • Type: FIX, Description: SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: drag & drop preview placeholder is always correctly sized
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Keyboard Shortcuts should not execute when in editable content
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ResponsivePopover: Set end button to pos 0 when no begin button is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fire intervalSelect event date from another month
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Reposition ValueStateHeader when long text is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: DateNavigation now uses firstDayOfWeek
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Html structure improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: correction for icon 'slim-arrow-up' for theme 'horizon'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix overflowing controls with 100% width
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Value is now formatted even if matching with previous value
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Avatar is not shown if there is no icon set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: Synchronize max appointment count
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationListBase: Priority icons are now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FacetFilter: Align button type to design guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: valueHelpOnly deprecation is now corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Item selection with dynamic suggestions now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: CopyProvider: Search owner control for CellSelector
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabFilter: Avoid reading parent properties if it doesn't exist during UI Adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust external label references
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Added "width" property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Badge on Button for Compact content density is properly positioned now
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: util/resolveReference: use probing-require before getting from global
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.7 and v4.19
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of ManagedObject.create
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: Support transitionMessagesOnly binding parameter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: deprecate blanket-based code instrumentation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate sap.ui.core.Configuration and API 'getConfiguration' on sap.ui.core.Core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of JSONView
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel: Support for withCredentials no longer experimental
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding: Support transitionMessagesOnly binding parameter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of sap.ui.core.Configuration.AnimationMode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate FormatSettings in sap.ui.core.Configuration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate APIs 'getAccessibility', 'getAnimationMode', and 'setAnimationMode' on sap.ui.core.Configuration.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: core/Configuration: deprecate fiori2Adaptation setting
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate static Object.isA and provide alternative
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Introduce sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate jQuery.sap.storage / jQuery.sap.util.UriParameters
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CLDR upgrade to version 43.0.0
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate APIs 'getAppCacheBuster' and 'getAppCacheBusterMode' on sap.ui.core.Configuration.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate APIs 'getOriginInfo', 'getDebug', 'getInspect' and 'getStatisticsEnabled' on sap.ui.core.Configuration.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.Configuration: deprecate getFileShareSupport
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of sap/ui/core/DeclarativeSupport
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate Configuration.getManifestFirst
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.LocaleData#getLanguageName: derive language name if necessary
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Move new security facade from sap/ui/core/Security.js to sap/ui/security/Security.js
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: UIComponent: Deprecate usage of Routing classes via globals and establish alternative
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: introduce new set of indication colors
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: DataType, Library: Enable enum type registration without globals
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Introduce new sap/ui/core/Security facade and deprecate APIs 'setSecurityTokenHandlers', 'getSecurityTokenHandlers', 'getFrameOptions' and 'getAllowlistService' on sap.ui.core.Configuration.
    • Type: FIX, Description: Remove legacy onInit definitions (global,function,eval)
    • Type: FIX, Description: Deprecate legacy config options
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/i18n/Formatting.setLanguageTag accept LanguageTag
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.qunit.i18n.helper._timezones: Set CLDR version to 43 for aCLDRTimezoneIDs
    • Type: FIX, Description: Stabilize QUnit test for BeaconRequest
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/i18n/Formatting: JSDoc correction
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/support/plugins/Selector: Fix missing Element dependency
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/config: Harmonize logging and only log sap params
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#bindTree: document transitionMessagesOnly parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: Stabilize Qunit test for themeRoot validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Normalize globalThis "sap-ui-config"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#_processSuccess: RFC9110 (205) violation
    • Type: FIX, Description: routing.RouteInfo: make the value type complete
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/RenderManager: method 'icon' should output 'aria-hidden'
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/InvisibleText: manually remove DOM when rendered in static UIArea
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding#expandNodeToLevel: keep siblings
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceBundle: Use Accept-Language: * for empty locale ("")
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.base.Metadata: Fix JSDoc return type of `getParent`
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#resetChanges: do not remove peristent messages
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.autowaiter._timeoutWaiter: Callback arguments corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/qunit/utils/nextUIUpdate
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Opa tests verified
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Version button visibility fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Aligned the notification badge in the header
  • Library: sap.ui.dt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate static Object.isA and provide alternative
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate static Object.isA and provide alternative
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Introduce date formatter
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: List Card Placeholders rendering is now improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: Avatar size in List Card with 2 lines (title and description) fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: maxValue of micro charts now works without binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Attribute icon in List card is now always on the same line with text
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Grouping of list items with microcharts now works
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: CellSelector: Improve removal of selection
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Field: enable autocomplete
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecate static Object.isA and provide alternative

    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#removePlugin] Please add plugins to the <code>dependents</code> aggregation instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.TreeAutoExpandMode#undefined] Different modes for setting the auto expand mode on tree or analytical bindings. This is an alias for {@link sap.ui.model.TreeAutoExpandMode} and kept for compatibility reasons.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [jQuery.sap.storage#undefined] Use {@link module:sap/ui/util/Storage sap/ui/util/Storage} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [jQuery.sap.storage.Storage#undefined] Use {@link module:sap/ui/util/Storage sap/ui/util/Storage} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [jQuery.sap.storage.Type#undefined] Use {@link module:sap/ui/util/Storage.Type sap/ui/util/Storage.Type} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [jQuery.sap.util#undefined] undefined
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [jQuery.sap.util.UriParameters#undefined] See deprecation notes of {@link module:sap/base/util/UriParameters sap/base/util/UriParameters} on how to migrate to URL web standard classes <code>URLSearchParams</code> / <code>URL</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [module:sap/base/util/mixedFetch#undefined] Allows to perform an synchronous or asynchronous XMLHttpRequest (XHR) with the provided resource URL and request settings. It returns a Promise resolving with an <code>module:sap/base/util/SimpleResponse</code> object, which is a simplified implementation of the global Response interface, representing the response of the XHR. It returns a <code>sap.ui.base.SyncPromise</code>, if the parameter <code>bSync</code> is set to 'true'. If the request encounters network failures, the returned promise will be rejected with a <code>TypeError</code>. In case of an HTTP error status (e.g. error status 404), the returned promise will resolve instead. The properties <code>response.ok</code> or <code>response.status</code> can be used to distinguish a success status from an error status. The Promise or SyncPromise will reject with a <code>DOMException</code> if the request gets aborted. To abort a request, an instance of the global <code>AbortSignal</code> must be provided to the settings. An abort signal can be created via an instance of the <code>AbortController</code>, and then using the <code>AbortController.signal</code> property. The signal associates the abort controller with the request and allows it to abort the XHR by calling <code>AbortController.abort()</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [module:sap/base/util/syncFetch#undefined] Performs a synchronous XMLHttpRequest (XHR) with the provided resource URL and request settings. It returns a <code>module:sap/base/util/SimpleResponse</code> object, which is a simplified implementation of the global Response interface, representing the response of the XHR. If the request encounters network failures, this method will throw a <code>TypeError</code>. In case of an HTTP error status (e.g. error status 404), no error will be thrown. The properties <code>response.ok</code> or <code>response.status</code> can be used to distinguish a success status from an error status. A <code>DOMException</code> will be thrown if the request gets aborted. To abort a request, an instance of the global <code>AbortSignal</code> must be provided to the settings. An abort signal can be created via an instance of the <code>AbortController</code>, and then using the <code>AbortController.signal</code> property. The signal associates the abort controller with the request and allows it to abort the XHR by calling <code>AbortController.abort()</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.base.Object#isA] please use {@link sap.ui.base.Object.isObjectA}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.CalendarType#undefined] Please use {@link module:sap/base/18n/date/CalendarType} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#undefined] Collects and stores the configuration of the current environment. The Configuration is initialized once when the {@link sap.ui.core.Core} is created. There are different ways to set the environment configuration (in ascending priority): <ol> <li>System defined defaults</li> <li>Server wide defaults, read from /sap-ui-config.json</li> <li>Properties of the global configuration object window["sap-ui-config"]</li> <li>A configuration string in the data-sap-ui-config attribute of the bootstrap tag.</li> <li>Individual data-sap-ui-<i>xyz</i> attributes of the bootstrap tag</li> <li>Using URL parameters</li> <li>Setters in this Configuration object (only for some parameters)</li> </ol> That is, attributes of the DOM reference override the system defaults, URL parameters override the DOM attributes (where empty URL parameters set the parameter back to its system default). Calling setters at runtime will override any previous settings calculated during object creation. The naming convention for parameters is: <ul> <li>in the URL : sap-ui-<i>PARAMETER-NAME</i>="value"</li> <li>in the DOM : data-sap-ui-<i>PARAMETER-NAME</i>="value"</li> </ul> where <i>PARAMETER-NAME</i> is the name of the parameter in lower case. Values of boolean parameters are case insensitive where "true" and "x" are interpreted as true.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#applySettings] Applies multiple changes to the configuration at once. If the changed settings contain localization related settings like <code>language</code> or <ode>calendarType</code>, then only a single <code>localizationChanged</code> event will be fired. As the framework has to inform all existing components, elements, models etc. about localization changes, using <code>applySettings</code> can significantly reduce the overhead for multiple changes, esp. when they occur after the UI has been created already. The <code>mSettings</code> can contain any property <code><i>xyz</i></code> for which a setter method <code>set<i>XYZ</i></code> exists in the API of this class. Similarly, values for the {@link sap.ui.core.Configuration.FormatSettings format settings} API can be provided in a nested object with name <code>formatSettings</code>.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getAccessibility] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/ControlBehavior.isAccessibilityEnabled} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getAllowlistService] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/security/Security.getAllowlistService} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getAnimationMode] Please use {@link module:sap/ui/core/ControlBehavior.getAnimationMode} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getAppCacheBuster] Base URLs to AppCacheBuster ETag-Index files.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getAppCacheBusterMode] The loading mode (sync|async|batch) of the AppCacheBuster (sync is default)
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getAutoAriaBodyRole] Returns whether the framework automatically adds the ARIA role 'application' to the HTML body or not.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getCalendarType] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Formatting.getCalendarType} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.Configuration#getCalendarWeekNumbering] Please use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/Formatting.getCalendarWeekNumbering} instead.

  • Library: sap.ui.unified

    • Type: FIX, Description: Stabilize QUnit test for BeaconRequest

item.title: Version 1.96.24 Changes

  • Library: sap.ui.core

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: enable drop over the browse button
